name: Pineapple Cream Cake
author: Dorothy Glastetter

ingredients.name: Nuts, coconut, or cherries if desired

instructions: Mix and bake cake as directed on package in a 9 x 13 inch pan. Let cool. Beat softened cream cheese with 1/2 cup milk until smooth. Add 1 1?2 cup milk and pudding mix. Beat on low speed until well blended. Let stand 5 to 10 minutes. Spread this over the cooled cake, then spread the drained pineapple over the pudding mixture. Next spread Cool Whip on top. Sprinkle with nuts, coconut or cherries. Chill and serve.
